exKxz = expectation(distribution, (kernel, inducing_variable), mean)
Kzx = kernel(Xmu_markov[:-1, :], Z)
xKxz = Kzx[..., None] * Xmu_markov[1:, (None), :]
assert_allclose(exKxz, xKxz, rtol=RTOL)
pytest.mark.parametrize('distribution', distrs('dirac_markov_gauss'))pytest.mark.parametrize('kernel', kern_args2)pytest.mark.parametrize('mean', means('identity'))
